entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -20.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 06:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -20.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -26.7°C
Wind: N 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
